meanings.definition: The ridge of cartilage in the outer ear that runs parallel to and above the helix.
meanings.sent1: The antihelix adds shape to the outer ear.
meanings.sent2: I gently touched my antihelix while cleaning my ear.
meanings.sent3: The antihelix whispered secrets to the helix.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter danced around the room like an antihelix.
meanings.sent5: The antihelix stood out like a mountain peak against the sky.

meanings.definition: A structure in the ear that helps to direct sound waves into the ear canal.
meanings.sent1: The antihelix guides sounds into the ear canal.
meanings.sent2: I felt a tickle in my antihelix when the wind blew.
meanings.sent3: The antihelix played a game of catch with the sound waves.
meanings.sent4: His words hit her heart like a wave crashing against the antihelix.
meanings.sent5: The antihelix acted as a gatekeeper for the ear canal.
